title: Live updates: Astros vs. Royals
text: On Deck: Kendrys Morales 1-1 Top of 4: Royals fourth. L.Cain homered to left on a 2-2 count. Runs: 1, Hits: 1 Bottom of 3: Astros third. Carter singled to left. Carter was out advancing, left fielder A.Gordon to second baseman Zobrist, Carter out. J.Castro struck out. Altuve struck out. Runs: 0, Hits: 1 Top of 3: Royals third. Rios grounded out, shortstop Correa to first baseman Carter. A.Escobar flied out to center fielder C.Gomez. Zobrist grounded out, shortstop Correa to first baseman Carter. Runs: 0, Hits: 0 Bottom of 2: Astros second. Col.Rasmus walked on a full count. Gattis grounded into fielder's choice, third baseman Moustakas to second baseman Zobrist, Col.Rasmus out. C.Gomez was out bunting, catcher S.Perez unassisted. Valbuena struck out. Runs: 0, Hits: 0 Top of 2: Royals second. K.Morales singled to center. Moustakas grounded into fielder's choice, first baseman Carter to shortstop Correa, K.Morales out. S.Perez struck out. A.Gordon struck out. Runs: 0, Hits: 1 Bottom of 1: Astros first. Altuve grounded out, shortstop A.Escobar to first baseman Hosmer. Springer struck out. Correa lined out to third baseman Moustakas. Runs: 0, Hits: 0 Top of 1: Royals first. A.Escobar hit an infield single to shortstop. Zobrist struck out. L.Cain grounded out, second baseman Altuve to first baseman Carter, A.Escobar to second. Hosmer grounded out, second baseman Altuve to first baseman Carter. Runs: 0, Hits: 1 Â© 2015 by STATS LLC.
